message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of efficiently disclosing a secret based on certain conditions, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The concept of capacity is also mentioned, which is a common topic in communication theory (cs.CC). The paper also involves analyzing the linear capacity, which is a topic in linear algebra and optimization (cs.DS). Finally, the paper proposes a noise and signal alignment approach, which is a technique commonly used in signal processing (cs.SI).
